roleset_name: make rise by adding leaven, permeate with something to cause a change

roles.descr: baker, agent adding leaven or other ingredient
roles.descr_trans: 面包师、添加酵母或其他成分的剂

roles.descr: bread, thing receiving leaven or being permeated
roles.descr_trans: 面包，接受发酵或被渗透的东西

roles.descr: leaven itself, type of leaven, thing added to permeate
roles.descr_trans: 发酵本身、发酵类型、渗透液中添加的物质

roleset_name_trans: 加酵发酵，渗透某种东西引起变化
